headline: Expedia CEO says any quarterly reporting change won't affect internal decisions
summary: Expedia CEO Ariane Gorin stresses focus on long-term value, saying earnings cadence wouldn't shift company strategy.

raw.headline: Expedia CEO says any quarterly reporting change won't affect internal decisions

headline: AI an 'incredible opportunity' for travel sector: Expedia Group CEO
summary: Expedia Group (EXPE) CEO Ariane Gorin sits down with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi on Market Domination to discuss the state of the travel industry and how artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming both Expedia and the travel industry at large. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Expedia CEO: Slow Growth in Consumer Business Was Due to Sluggish U.S. Market
summary: Expedia Group's consumer brands aren't firing on all cylinders. It's a priority to rev them up.

raw.headline: Expedia CEO: Slow Growth in Consumer Business Was Due to Sluggish U.S. Market
